com.audianz.core

Class BaseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audianz.core.BaseModel

  • public class BaseModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The BaseModel class is the base class for all the Model classes. All the model classes need to extend BaseModel class. It provides the common functionalities to all the Model classes.
    Author:
